str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To shout aloud, cry out. From ana and krazo; to scream up.
All at once, all together. Dative case of a compound of pas and plethos; in full multitude, i.e. Concertedly or simultaneously.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.
Barabbas. Of Chaldee origin; son of Abba; Bar-abbas, an Israelite.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
